Class tripleplay.ui.Style

Added Methods
TextStyle createTextStyle(Element<?>) Creates a text style instance based on the supplied element's stylings.
 

Changed Methods
TextFormat createTextFormat(Element<?>) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link #createTextStyle}.
 

Added Fields
Flag AUTO_SHRINK Whether or not to automatically shrink a text widget's font size until it fits into the horizontal space it has been allotted.
Style<Integer> GRADIENT_COLOR The color of the gradient.
GradientTypeStyle GRADIENT_TYPE The type of gradient.
Style<IconEffect> ICON_EFFECT The effect to apply to the icon.
